title: Outstanding build issues
content:
Owned by Chris Rogers Last updated: May 04, 2016 by Chris Rogers

flask-enforcement disable

selinux permissive

/var/*/xen directories

/etc/xen/xl.conf

change iso in templates from file → raw

xl still needs script in /usr/lib/xen/bin/qemu-system-i386:

#!/bin/bash

/usr/bin/qemu-system-i386 $@
disclaimer: Users of this benchmark dataset are advised to check Atlassian’s official documentation for the most current information.
